item.title: Your First Test Project
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example project. This content will allow you to test and configure your site before you're ready to create actual projects. You can replace this project with projects of your own when your site is ready to launch.
Competently create innovative systems through reliable materials. Energistically transition corporate infomediaries and next-generation intellectual capital. Collaboratively leverage other's innovative niches rather than quality ideas.
Objectively enhance client-centered opportunities vis-a-vis distributed bandwidth. Monotonectally evolve enabled web-readiness via front-end initiatives. Authoritatively optimize state of the art paradigms rather than stand-alone users.

item.title: Rewards
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: This deal has rewards because the Project Rewards Add-on (Group Buying -> Add-ons) is activated, and rewards were added below under "Funding Rewards."

item.title: Free Project
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: This project is free, so the price is set to 0.

item.title: Purchase Limits
item.dc:creator: demo
item.content:encoded: This project's payments will not be captured until it reaches its funding reaches the minimum of 2 dollars. It also has a maximum of 2 pledges per user.
